title: Kyouen Server Datastore Schema
description: Database schema definition for Kyouen puzzle game Datastore entities

id.description: Entity ID (integer for auto-generated, string for named keys)

KyouenPuzzleSummary.description: Global statistics and metadata for the puzzle game

count.description: Total number of puzzle stages in the system

lastDate.description: Timestamp of the last update to the summary

usage.description: Singleton entity to track global game statistics

KyouenPuzzle.description: Individual puzzle stages containing game configuration and metadata

stageNo.description: Sequential stage number for ordering and identification

size.description: Grid size for the puzzle (e.g., 8 for 8x8 grid)

stage.description: Puzzle configuration as a string. '0'=empty, '1'=black stone, '2'=white stone

creator.description: Name/identifier of the user who created this stage

registDate.description: Timestamp when the stage was registered/created

indexes.description: Primary ordering index for stage retrieval
Index for duplicate detection and stage lookup

constraints.stageValidation: Stage string length must equal size²
constraints.uniqueStageNo: stageNo must be unique across all stages
constraints.kyouenRequirement: Stage must contain at least one valid kyouen (circle/line with 4 stones)
constraints.minimumStones: Stage must contain at least 5 stones (marked as '1')

usage.description: Core puzzle data with validation rules for game mechanics
queryPatterns: Filter by stageNo for specific stage lookup
Order by stageNo for sequential stage retrieval
Filter by stage string for duplicate detection

User.description: User account information and game progress tracking

keyPattern.description: Named keys with 'KEY' prefix + Firebase UID

screenName.description: Twitter screen name for display purposes

image.description: URL to user's Twitter profile image

clearStageCount.description: Number of stages cleared by this user

twitterUid.description: Twitter User ID for reference (used with OAuth)

accessToken.description: Legacy OAuth access token (deprecated, TODO: remove)

accessSecret.description: Legacy OAuth access secret (deprecated, TODO: remove)

usage.description: User account management with Firebase authentication integration
usage.lifecycle: Created on first login, updated on profile changes and stage completion

StageUser.description: Many-to-many relationship tracking which users have cleared which stages

clearDate.description: Timestamp when the user cleared this stage

indexes.description: Composite index for checking if specific user cleared specific stage
Index for retrieving all stages cleared by a user

constraints.uniqueStageUser: Each user can only have one clear record per stage
constraints.validReferences: stage and user keys must reference existing entities

queryPatterns: Filter by stage + user to check if user cleared specific stage
Filter by user to get all cleared stages for a user
Used for synchronizing client progress with server
usage.businessLogic: Updates user.clearStageCount when new records are created

StageUser_to_KyouenPuzzle.description: Each StageUser record references one KyouenPuzzle

StageUser_to_User.description: Each StageUser record references one User

User_to_StageUser.description: Each User can have multiple cleared stages
User_to_StageUser.relationship: User clearStageCount is maintained as denormalized count

projectConfiguration.description: Uses Firestore in Datastore mode for compatibility with existing Datastore data

stageRepresentation.description: Stages are represented as strings where each character represents a grid cell
stageRepresentation.gridMapping: String index = x + y * size (row-major order)

rules: Exactly 4 stones must form a circle or straight line
New stages must have at least 5 total stones
New stages must contain at least one valid kyouen solution

duplicateDetection.description: Prevents duplicate stages using rotation and reflection checking
duplicateDetection.implementation: Stages are checked against all 8 possible orientations (4 rotations × 2 reflections)
